data.event: Wellington was settled in 1818 by Ephraim Wilcox, Charles Sweet, William T. Welling, John Clifford, and Joseph Wilson from the states of Massachusetts and New York.

event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1855

data.event: Wellington was incorporated as a village in 1855.

event.title: 1858, the former American House Hotel (later torn down and replaced

data.event: In 1858, the former American House Hotel (later torn down and replaced by Herrick Memorial Library) was the site of the Oberlin-Wellington Rescue.
